dashboard.Neue_Templates_discription1: Our goal is to make the new technologies of AI-supported marketing automation easily accessible to you.

dashboard.Roadmap_discription2: Here you will be shown exactly what we have planned as upcoming expansions!
dashboard.Darkmode_integrierung_discription1: Come to the dark side of the Force!
dashboard.Darkmode_integrierung_discription2: We have integrated our DarkMode so that you can also work at night and undercover.
dashboard.24/7_Support_discription1: Our support team and our AI worker
dashboard.24/7_Support_discription3: is available to you 7 days a week.
dashboard.Newsletter_discription1: You don't want to miss news from typehook.com?
dashboard.Newsletter_discription2: Then sign up for our newsletter here and we will send you weekly updates on AI and the current trend in AI and digital marketing
dashboard.Schnellere_Abfrage_discription1: We are constantly working on optimizing our systems to give you an optimal user experience!
